pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, December 19, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a community event hosted by Magasin-Partage Villeray.

660, rue Villeray

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

Media appearances

7:40 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on 98.5 FM’s Puisqu’il faut se lever.

8:30 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on TVA’s Salut Bonjour.

9:20 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CHOM 97.7 FM’s Mornings Rock.

5:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CBC’s Power & Politics.
